Directions for the vvorthy receiuing of the Lords Supper with some few questions to the same purpose. By Robert Iension, Batchelor in Diuinity, and Minister of Gods Word, at New-Castle vpon Tine. Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.
[54] p.
Printed [by G. Purslowe] for Iohn Harrigat, and are to be sold at the Holy Lambe in Pater-noster Row, London : 1624.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-C D⁴ (-D4). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
